section.name: What is Pustefix
section.p: Pustefix is a framework that helps you to develop web based applications (referred to as projects here). A high level view of the system is given on this page. The framework consists of two more or less independent parts:

ul.li: A machinery to apply recursive XSLT transformations that produces the UI of the web application. You can learn more about this here.
A Java framework that takes input from the UI to change the application data and supplies changes of the application data back to the UI. This part is explained in much more detail here

section.p: Together, the framework acts similar to the Model-View-Controller pattern.
